49.eng-name: The Description of the Prophet, may Allah Bless Him and Grant Him Peace
49.ara-name: كتاب صفة النبى صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Abu Nuaym that Wahb ibn Kaysan said, "The Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, was brought food while his stepson Umar ibn Salama was with him. The Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, said to him, 'Say "Bismillah," and eat what is in front of you
